Uproar winces with a sheepish look on his face.

"Ooops, I - didn't hear ya=
 comming.. Okay, okay, so yeah, I'm rankn' on 'em my bad.  But seriously, o=
kay, Legacy works well in battles but his social skills, leave lots ta be d=
esired."

Straight Shot shrugs.

"I'm staying out of this.  I'm not the one=
 who brought up the counting thing."

Quickstride nudges Uproar.

"Nice goi=
ng, open mouth insert paw."

Uproar shrugs.

" Well, it's kinda true.  Ever=
y time we try ta ask 'em a question we get blown off."

Straight Shot nodds=
.

" Yeah, that part is kind of right.  He's not exactly the most sociable =
part, and nothing against him but, he is treading on thin ice with Tucson s=
ir, and I really think someone should talk to Tucson before he blows his ow=
n stack.  I can see it in my brother's face, there's an air about him that =
seems troubling.  One of these days a real fight between them will break ou=
t and there may be no way ta stop it.  I tried talking to Tucson but he's a=
s stubborn as Ratchet in that respect.  So, how do we hold the peace with b=
oth of them, because I'd really like ta know that."

ride a curious look

ndedly held the

"
